entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Southend Reindeer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Southend 5:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: ESE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 31. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
